TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Mrs. DeTour speaking."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Hello ma'am, I'm calling about Evan Banks."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Oh! Do- do you know where he is?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Afraid not, I just have some questions."

TITLE: You
BODY: "When did you last see Evan?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "April 9th, he didn't say where he was going."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "I guess I didn't ask him, but oh how I wish I did. I tried calling him when it got late and nothing, so I called the police."[back111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "What does Evan do for work?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "He works at some dock in Abra City, I couldn't tell you why. He was always more of a fan of the mountains. He doesn't even like the water."[back111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Does Evan own a brown fishing jacket?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Fishing jacket? I doubt it, he hated anything to do with the water."[back111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Does Evan or someone close to him own a boat?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Own a boat? He's 26! There's no way he could afford a boat, nor any of his friends for that matter."[back111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "That's everything, thanks."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I'm calling to figure that out."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "I see- very well."[back111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "We may have found him."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Oh thank God! Oh I've missed him so much."

TITLE: You
BODY: "We found a body, ma'am. Found in a fishing boat."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Oh no-! Wait."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "A fishing boat? Evan didn't fish!"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Would Evan have gone out with a friend?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Evan hates being on the sea! This doesn't make any sense."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "I can't- this can't be true." click[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "He could've been going to Pettiget Island."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "For what reason? We don't know anyone there, he hated sailing."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Who even are you, I'm calling the police." click[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "He's dead, killed at sea."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Killed at sea!? What was he doing out there?! He didn't even like the sea!"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Is this some sort of sick joke? Who are you!? I'm calling the police." click[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I'm a detective with Abra PD, is this Evan Banks' mother?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "yes it is- is there some update with the case?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Yes, I just need to ask you some questions."

TITLE: You
BODY: "When did you last see Evan?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "On the 9th. He was going out for something, but didn't say what."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "He normally comes home around midnight if he's hanging out with friends, but I called all of them and they said they hadn't seen him."[back211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "What did Evan do for work, for fun?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "For work? He worked at the docks in Abra, which he absolutely hated."[back211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Did Evan own a brown fishing jacket?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "You sure it wasn't some sort of survival gear? That'd be more like him."[back211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Did Evan have a boat?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "God no, he works minimum wage."[back211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I have everything I need, thank you."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Wait wait wait, what's the update?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "We found a body, I don't believe it's Evan's however."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "I hope you're right then. Good bye." click[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "We found a body, it may be Evan."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "I- I- I'm coming to the station, you need me to identify it right? I'll- oh my- one second." click[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Possibly, can you tell me about Evan?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Sure I suppose- he worked at the dock here in Abra, which he hated. He's much more interested in hiking and camping, that sort of thing."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "What else do you want to know?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Why'd he hate his work?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "He hates the water, really, always hated boats. I think he only works at the dock cause- well- it's all he could get."[back21211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "When did you last see him?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "April 9th, he left that morning, when he didn't come home I called his friends and they didn't know where he was either, and that's when I called the police."[back21211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Did he own a brown fishing jacket?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "You sure it wasn't some survival gear? Cause he didn't fish."[back21211]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I think I know all I need to now."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "No, I'm calling for a different case."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Why're you ringing me then?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "I need you to tell me when you last saw Evan."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Oh, uh, April 9th."[back2131]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I need to confirm some things about Evan."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Does he own a brown fishing jacket?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "No I don't think so, he didn't fish."[back21312]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Does he have a boat?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "God no, what a waste of money. I'd be baffled if he got one."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "And confused as to how he afforded it."[back21312]

TITLE: You
BODY: "That's all, thanks for your time."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "To see if they're related."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Alright I suppose-."[back21312]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Can you answer a few questions?"

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "I'm not interested in whatever you're selling"

TITLE: You
BODY: "No no no, I'm a detective."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Well why didn't you say so?"[back111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "It's about Evan."

TITLE: Eloise DeTour
BODY: "Did you find him?"[back212]
